game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.synopsis: Explore the vast open world of Hyrule as Link, a hero chosen to defeat Calamity Ganon.
game.beginning: Wake up in the ruined Temple of Time. Meet Impa, who has been watching over Link. Learn about your quest and gather the necessary tools.
game.ending: Defeat Calamity Ganon and save Hyrule from destruction.
